channel.title: Few Problems
channel.description:
1) What's the code I would put to give some one an item (Like, You mine a rock, you get an ore, or you thieve from a stall, You get Money/an Item)
2) Is there an Animations List somewhere that I can download/look at. (The one on satan's isle isnt really..correct)
3) Im using satan's Isle, But I'm wanting to make it so you can teleport, how would I go about doing this.
4) I've used several tut's on how to make somewhere a SafeZone, but they dont work :eek: Note: I have this code in client.java: [code] public boolean inSafezone() { // by Frost if((absX >=2708 && absX <=2816 && absY >=3149 && absY <=3235 ) || (absX >=3464 && absX <=3510 && absY >=9480 && absY <=9519 ) || (absX >=2438 && absX <=2447 && absY >=3082 && absY <=3098 ) || (absX >=3545 && absX <=3582 && absY >=3267 && absY <=3308 ) || (absX >=2812 && absX <=2867 && absY >=3230 && absY <=3310 ) || (absX >=2705 && absX <=2735 && absY >=9800 && absY <=9832 ) || (absX >=2528 && absX <=2548 && absY >=4710 && absY <=4725 ) || (absX >=2370 && absX <=2420 && absY >=5125 && absY <=6169 ) || (absX >=2794 && absX <=2814 && absY >=9190 && absY <=9220 ) || (absX >=3227 && absX <=3239 && absY >=9320 && absY <=9310 ) || (absX >=3021 && absX <=3057 && absY >=4816 && absY <=4850 ) || (absX >=2508 && absX <=2540 && absY >=4627 && absY <=4670 )) return true; else return false; } [/code] [s]5) This is a really nooby question, But I can't seem to figure it out :o How Do I make it so the emote tabs have a name, instead of just being blank. (If that makes any sense..)[/s]
6) I added A npc, added a "wanneshop" and a shop in shops.cfg, but when you click on the npc, he doesnt do anything, is there anything else im supposed to do? Thanks for any of your help, And thanks for At least Looking ;)

item.title: Few Problems
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

  1. Make sure the SHop Id matches in both Shops.cfg and Client.java
  2. Look in Text HAndler
    4)Look up Nonwild in CLient.java

This is what it looks like in mine

public boolean nonWild() { if ((absX >= 3222 && absX <= 3270 && absY >= 3333 && absY <= 3360) || (absX >= 3297 && absX <= 3310 && absY >= 3115 && absY <= 3131) || (absX >= 2442 && absX <= 2487 && absY item.description:
@Wildcat_240 wrote:

  1. What’s the code I would put to give some one an item (Like, You mine a rock, you get an ore, or you thieve from a stall, You get Money/an Item)

  2. Is there an Animations List somewhere that I can download/look at. (The one on satan’s isle isnt really…correct)

  3. Im using satan’s Isle, But I’m wanting to make it so you can teleport, how would I go about doing this.

  4. I’ve used several tut’s on how to make somewhere a SafeZone, but they dont work :eek: Note: I have this code in client.java: public boolean inSafezone() { // by Frost if((absX >=2708 && absX <=2816 && absY >=3149 && absY <=3235 ) || (absX >=3464 && absX <=3510 && absY >=9480 && absY <=9519 ) || (absX >=2438 && absX <=2447 && absY >=3082 && absY <=3098 ) || (absX >=3545 && absX <=3582 && absY >=3267 && absY <=3308 ) || (absX >=2812 && absX <=2867 && absY >=3230 && absY <=3310 ) || (absX >=2705 && absX <=2735 && absY >=9800 && absY <=9832 ) || (absX >=2528 && absX <=2548 && absY >=4710 && absY <=4725 ) || (absX >=2370 && absX <=2420 && absY >=5125 && absY <=6169 ) || (absX >=2794 && absX <=2814 && absY >=9190 && absY <=9220 ) || (absX >=3227 && absX <=3239 && absY >=9320 && absY <=9310 ) || (absX >=3021 && absX <=3057 && absY >=4816 && absY <=4850 ) || (absX >=2508 && absX <=2540 && absY >=4627 && absY <=4670 )) return true; else return false; }
    5) This is a really nooby question, But I can’t seem to figure it out :o How Do I make it so the emote tabs have a name, instead of just being blank. (If that makes any sense…)

  5. I added A npc, added a “wanneshop” and a shop in shops.cfg, but when you click on the npc, he doesnt do anything, is there anything else im supposed to do?
